main event: A man and 3 children found multiple silvery objects in the Mojave Desert, believed to be a new type of chaff.
interesting points: The objects were shiny and metallic in appearance., The discovered items were approximately 1 to 1.5 inches long and 1/16 of an inch wide., The incident took place about 15 miles southwest of Edwards Air Force Base., The report suggests the objects were not recognized as a known type of radar reflector., Samples of the objects were not forwarded for analysis.
